changeSet.author: copilot
changeSet.comment: Create issue attachments table for storing file references from MinIO
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS REMSFAL.issue_attachments ( issue_id UUID, attachment_id UUID, file_name TEXT, content_type TEXT, bucket TEXT, object_name TEXT, file_size BIGINT, uploaded_by UUID, created_at TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (issue_id, attachment_id) ) WITH CLUSTERING ORDER BY (attachment_id DESC);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS issue_attachments_attachment_id_idx ON REMSFAL.issue_attachments (attachment_id);
